categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: During the time of the Clone Wars, a Low Altitude Assault Transport/carrier with a picture of a snarling wampa on the front of it saw service with the Grand Army of the Republic. A number of clone troopers gave the vehicle the nickname Wampa Runner.
Wampa Runner was use to transport an AT-TE in the 501st Legion's assault on Teth to rescue Jabba the Hutt's son.
